document_data.caption: A map showing Silver Street in west Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Silver Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Silver Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in west Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]], Silver Street ran north to south in between [[Winter Walk]] and [[Pride Street]] for approximately {{SI|500|ft|long=yes}}.
